source.name: Certified Cover Crops Planted in the Chesapeake Bay Watershed (Annually)
source.description: The Governor's strategic goal on the Chesapeake Bay is to restore the Bay to a healthy bay tipping point by 2025.  StateStat tracks acres planted of certified cover crops as a metric of the overall health of the bay.

datasets.name: Certified Cover Crops Planted in the Chesapeake Bay Watershed (Annually)
datasets.description: The Governor's strategic goal on the Chesapeake Bay is to restore the Bay to a healthy bay tipping point by 2025.  StateStat tracks acres planted of certified cover crops as a metric of the overall health of the bay.

datasets.name: Chesapeake Bay Pollution Reduction Activities
datasets.description: The Governor's Strategic Policy Goal 7 is to restore the Chesapeake Bay to a healthy bay tipping point by 2025.  StateStat tracks the overall health of the bay in addition to specific restoration actions undertaken by Maryland's State Agencies.

datasets.name: Stormwater Retrofits (Acres Retrofitted): Column Chart
datasets.description: The Governor's strategic goal on the Chesapeake Bay is to restore the Bay to a healthy bay tipping point by 2025.  StateStat tracks acres of stormwater retrofits as a metric of the overall health of the bay.

datasets.name: Agricultural Stream Protection (Acres): Column Chart
datasets.description: The Governor's strategic goal on the Chesapeake Bay is to restore the Bay to a healthy bay tipping point by 2025.  StateStat tracks acres of agricultural streams protected as a metric of our progress towards achieving this goal.

datasets.name: Wastewater Treatment Plants Retrofitted for Enhanced Nutrient Removal, Column Graph
datasets.description: The Governor's Strategic Policy Goal 7 is to restore the Chesapeake Bay to a healthy bay tipping point by 2025.  StateStat tracks the overall health of the bay in addition to specific restoration actions undertaken by Maryland's State Agencies.
